name: Hawaiian Haze
description: Hawaiian Haze is a sativa marijuana strain that produces some high-quality sativa effects. A mix of Hawaiian and Haze genetics, these light, airy buds will have your head in the clouds. Many users also report that it makes them sociable and talkative. Hawaiian Hazeâ€™s floral smell and taste of tropical fruit might just have you daydreaming about an island vacation. Hawaiian Haze is available in a non-intoxicating CBD variety bred by Oregon CBD.
